com.bmc.arsys.apitransport

Class ApiProxyBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.ApiProxyBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiProxyI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiProxyJRpcBase, Proxy

    public abstract class ApiProxyBase
extends Object
implements ApiProxyI
    The base class that contains the common base methods that can be used for different type of AR Proxy. i.e. Proxy extends ApiProxyBase ProxyJrpc extends ProxyJRpcBase => ApiProxyJRpcBase => ApiProxyBase CMDBProxy extends ApiProxyBase

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.bmc.arsys.apitransport.ApiProxyI

        AR_JNI_RPC, AR_JRPC, CMDB_JRPC, RPC_NONE

      • ARTermination

        public abstract long ARTermination(ApiUserContextI ctx)
                            throws ARException
        Description copied from interface: ApiProxyI
        Performs environment-specific cleanup routines and disconnects from the specified Action Request System session. All API programs that interact with AR System should call this function upon completing work in a given session. Calling this function is especially important in environments that use floating licenses. If you do not disconnect from the server, your license token is unavailable for other users for the defined time-out interval.
        Specified by:
        ARTermination in interface ApiProxyI
        Throws:
        ARException - if routines are not performed
